org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest

类 MetricsRESTSourceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.BaseSourceImpl
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest.MetricsRESTSourceImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.BaseSource, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.JvmPauseMonitorSource, MetricsRESTSource, org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.MetricsSource

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class MetricsRESTSourceImpl
extends org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.BaseSourceImpl
implements MetricsRESTSource
    Hadoop Two implementation of a metrics2 source that will export metrics from the Rest server to the hadoop metrics2 subsystem. Implements BaseSource through BaseSourceImpl, following the pattern
